en.headline: We're helping make the world a greener place

content.html:
The BillionTrees Project was initiated in 2020 to help further our mission to protect, preserve and restore the natural environment of our nation’s major rivers and their watersheds.

Our mission is to not only clean up the river ways but to also enhance the watershed by planting native trees and removing invasive plants.
content.markdown:
The BillionTrees Project was initiated in 2020 to help further our mission to protect, preserve and restore the natural environment of our nation’s major rivers and their watersheds.

Our mission is to not only clean up the river ways but to also enhance the watershed by planting native trees and removing invasive plants.

description.html: We surveyed 5,000 trees about what they think humans should stop doing. The responses may surprise you.
description.markdown: We surveyed 5,000 trees about what they think humans should stop doing. The responses may surprise you.

description.html: Check out photos and highlights from our Tree Fiesta in Orlando. We include dates for the next tree planting fiestas.
description.markdown: Check out photos and highlights from our Tree Fiesta in Orlando. We include dates for the next tree planting fiestas.

description.html: You won't believe how easy it is to start a compost in your backyard. Reduce your landfill waste by 50% and use your leaf and lawn clippings to make your pile a decomposing machine.
description.markdown: You won't believe how easy it is to start a compost in your backyard. Reduce your landfill waste by 50% and use your leaf and lawn clippings to make your pile a decomposing machine.

description.html: Against popular opinion, grass-eating mammals actually play a key role in sustaining the environment, especially the top soil. So don't stop eating meat, rather support regenerative agriculture.
description.markdown: Against popular opinion, grass-eating mammals actually play a key role in sustaining the environment, especially the top soil. So don't stop eating meat, rather support regenerative agriculture.

description.html: This article encloses the secret art of tree whispering. You'll find out everything you need to know to have heartfelt, blissful conversations with your fellow trees.
description.markdown: This article encloses the secret art of tree whispering. You'll find out everything you need to know to have heartfelt, blissful conversations with your fellow trees.

posts.title: Are we really headed towards mass extinction?

description.html: Yes, it's possible at any moment. But we don't have to be shaking in our boots. This guide will show you some meager but significant ways to enjoy and cherish the beautiful earth, while she's still around.
description.markdown: Yes, it's possible at any moment. But we don't have to be shaking in our boots. This guide will show you some meager but significant ways to enjoy and cherish the beautiful earth, while she's still around.
